phrs.translation: 相反物, 反对, 对立性, 反对关系

sentences.sentence: Entity can not be moved for its having no contrariety.
sentences.translation: 实体没有对立面，所以实体没有运动。

sentences.sentence: If you had any real griefs, you'd be ashamed to waste a tear on this little contrariety.
sentences.translation: 要是你有过真正的悲哀，你就会觉得你为了这点小别扭掉眼泪是可耻的了。

sentences.sentence: I exclaimed. 'If you had any real griefs, you'd be ashamed to waste a tear on this little contrariety.
sentences.translation: 我叫着。“要是你有过真正的悲哀，你就会觉得你为了这点小别扭掉眼泪是可耻的了。”
